mapper.select:
select t.id, t.equipmentname, t.msg, t.createdate from l_cheatlog_t t where 1=1
and t.createdate>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.createdate <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and instr(t.equipmentname,#{model})>0
order by t.createdate desc
mapper.insert:
select l_cheatlog_s.nextval from dual
insert into l_cheatlog_t t (t.id, t.msg, t.equipmentname, t.reserve1, t.reserve2, t.reserve3, t.createdate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{msg ,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{equipmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{reserve1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{reserve2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{reserve3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, sysdate)
